I'm almost certain, that it is German Crack fault. There is no AddonSpeech and not even subtitles! Could someone tell me where i can find Eng. Crack for Addon?
And speechFiles are ok. German crack just doesnt read them.

Well, I manage to do that:
1. install english Gothic2
2. install this english notr addon
3. install update v2.6 german
----
now I have english speech and german text (at least at the begining and there is also english speech, which it hasn't been there before)
----
4. I installed english transtations G2aTT-G2TNoTR_v1.0.exe.
---
Now I have both english text and speech, but they don't came well together :).
wow :D quite clever ;) (Y) I'll try.
Oh... and Thanks! :)

Hey I figured it out.

Go into your
Gothic2_workDataScriptsContentCutscene

and rename OU.DAT to OU.BIN
and OU.lsc to OU.csl

Full english finally!
BTW if you already have those files in there, delete them and then rename.

Just so you know, if a patch or nocd crack comes out for this, you will need to rename them back to their original names before you use the crack or patch.

Your Welcome!
